name: Quick Events Manager
author: PANKAJ ANUPAM

sections.description:
Event Manager

Please leave a commment at http://pankajanupam.in/wordpress-plugins/quick-events-manager/ for any issue & help me to improve the plugin. I will reply within 1 day.
sections.installation:
You can install Quick Events Manager directly from the WordPress admin panel.

Visit the Plugins > Add New and search for 'Quick Events Manager'.  Click to install. 
 Once installed, activate and it is functional.

Manual Installation Quick Events Manager plugin:

    Download and unzip the file      Upload the full extracted folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory      Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress.

You’re done! The Plugin ready to use according to the directions in the description.
sections.faq:
Where can I see this in action
